'''''"Rilai"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Duelist: Series II]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Iktomisaurus Warrior: Cryocrystal Cannon|text=Rilai &mdash; Frozen Collar}} while she is using the Fusion Nova ability as well as not being hit by any of the ability's attacks at any point in a battle.
